column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Macarons - 4.0/5.0 - Though slightly larger in size than others you would find in the Houston area
column2: I think you can still find better tasting versions at Bite. We tried the pistachio (which missed the mark for me) and the PB&J (almost identical and delicious to the one you'd find at Bouchon Bakery).
